publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1010 Colin Campbell: Royal Ordnance Factory, Bishopton—That the Parliament supports the workforce of the Royal Ordnance Factory Bishopton in its efforts to retain munitions propellant manufacturing in the United Kingdom. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-1010 Royal Ordnance Factory, Bishopton (lodged on 14 June 2000) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Christine Grahame*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Tricia Marwick*, Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*
